DOC.brief_summary: This 3-month non-interventional , observational study patient moderate severe asthma .
DOC.brief_title: Non-interventional Surveillance Effectiveness Symbicort® Maintenance And Reliever Therapy ( Symbicort® SMART ) Treatment Moderate Severe Asthma
DOC.criteria: Patients moderate severe asthma Symbicort SMART treatment Under 18 year old
